name: Ratty's Stew: An Immersive Cooking Simulation
name_original: Ratty's Stew: An Immersive Cooking Simulation
description:
Ratty’s Stew is a platforming/ cooking simulator. You play as Ratty, a chef with a very messy kitchen and a stew he needs to make. find all of the ingredients in the level and finish making your meal!

Made in a team of 4 people:

Joekickass - Programmer/Level Designer 

Pixel Ultimate - Character Artist/ Animator/ 3D Artist 

Nik - Sound Designer/ Music Composer/ 3D Artist 

Owain - 3D Artist

Special Thanks to President Crabo for moral support and making a tomato that looked like a Christmas decoration that we didn’t actually end up using
